title: When you are recalling in a bush with 5 health, and you see the entire enemy team walk by

replies.body:
True Bravery is when you dance as they walk buy and spam your laugh, then back before they find you.

http://49.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lxvpzebkFA1rn95k2o1_400.gif
bruh. you gotta have balls of steel
You are right, I indeed have Balls http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view6/3352331/balls-of-steel-o.gif

2 scary 4 me
http://45.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_ly7ix2dUyB1qbjttio1_500.gif
MFW I'm a support main and I alt+tab to change the music and I come back to the enemy team walking past my bush to invade Krugs.   *Nothing to see here in this safe bush! Nothing at all!*
http://www.reactiongifs.us/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/nothing_to_see_here_naked_gun.gif

It's not letting me up vote

https://media.giphy.com/media/tBgMJKuKDcyf6/giphy.gif
https://media.giphy.com/media/KBh2mjXyQaZO/giphy.gif
http://nick.mtvnimages.com/nick/shows/images/spongebob-squarepants/flipbooks/spongebob-squarepants-say-it-with-gif-2.gif
upvote bc name
Why the hell is this at -2...?
League community.
Laughing Fish hating heathens.

Purge the Herasy
http://i.imgur.com/zO6FNKZ.gif?Noredirect

I'll get my umbrella

http://i.imgur.com/5C5l2sj.gif

League community is made of Toxic assholes. But they are MY toxic assholes.
https://media.giphy.com/media/xTiTnBtzaxKtrzWv9m/giphy.gif
oh... my...

animal rights called
all 3 members came to downvote
God damn PETA.
https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2014-03/enhanced/webdr02/19/21/anigif_enhanced-buzz-12664-1395277247-13.gif
And one of them has sunfire cape so you die. :(

Then one throws a ward in there with you:
http://orig12.deviantart.net/1b9a/f/2012/176/3/4/please_don__t_see_me_____heyyyy_xd_by_bookworm16016-d54ucd2.png

when you almost get away from the enemy rengar
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
No horror game on Earth can ever replicate the feeling of recalling on 5 health and someone walks through your brush.
https://media.giphy.com/media/t8vI9EexNVS24/giphy.gif

And then the enemy Aurelion Sol's star smacks you in the face.

http://pre15.deviantart.net/bf83/th/pre/i/2016/070/3/b/deal_with_aurelion_sol_by_renteii-d9uogy9.png

This is what he does to your hopes and dreams.
https://49.media.tumblr.com/eec57917cb1265775dad181615af517c/tumblr_o3hdw17IDr1qfjqf7o2_500.gif
"But the thing they do best, is beg for mercy."

this one is great, 

so i guess darius can see cho in the bush, but darius' summoner...idk

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AbmsbJJ8rAA
Same goes if you're recalling with 5 health and and an exclamation point pops -up above your head.
Or you are Rengar and it pops up over _their_ heads.

That moment on ARAM when you somehow find yourself stuck in the bush behind the enemies first tower. Low health, and completely undetected. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Even worse: The other night I was playing a game and our team had a Teemo. Our team got a bunch of kills, took baron, and the Teemo went top to push the inhib tower while the rest of us were in mid. The ENTIRE enemy team showed up top just as Teemo went invisible standing in the middle of the lane. His baron buff was still buffing the minions around him, but no one had a pink ward, so they had no idea where Teemo was. He typed in chat "I am so scared right now" right before the enemy team finally gave up looking for him despite all the baron minions that were magically appearing in top lane. He ran away and backed, and they never figured out what happened.
Ya know...i always wondered if they could hear me if i laughed while in brush.
http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view5/2824222/kronk-o.gif this is what you should of used
The moment when you successfully make it back to base but die because an auto attack followed you all the way back to base
Thats when i go in :D
{{champion:17}} *laugh*
I can't upvote this enough.
Me as Twitch lit
Logged in to upvote
